description: Kojirou is the kendo instructor for Muroe High School and he's totally broke. But then an unexpected chance is given to him: his team must win against his senpai's team and the prize is: free meals for a whole year! Now, the only problem left... where to find girls skilled enough and willing to join the kendo team?

node.description:
__Height:__ 158 cm

[Profile (Aoni)](https://www.aoni.co.jp/search/kuwashima-houko.html) | [Twitter](https://twitter.com/roudokuya_dajai) | [Wiki (en)](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Houko_Kuwashima) | [Wiki (jp)](https://ja.wikipedia.org/wiki/桑島法子)

Houko Kuwashima is a Japanese voice actress and singer. She is capable of playing a variety of roles, ranging from young boys to feminine women. Kuwashima is currently affiliated with Aoni Production. Her first major role was as Yurika Misumaru in Martian Successor Nadesico.

__Non-anime roles:__
- Android 21 - Dragon Ball FighterZ (VG)
- Presea Combatir - Tales of Symphonia (VG)
- Serenica - Dragon Quest XI S: Echoes of an Elusive Age - Definitive Edition (VG)
- Kasumi - Dead or Alive series (VG)
- Roselinde Freya - Shining Blade (VG)
- Mei Ling - Metal Gear Series (VG)
- Jingliu - Honkai: Star Rail (VG)
- Ries Argent - The Legend of Heroes Series (VG)

A Japanese voice actor. She's also a certified junior and senior high school teacher.

Hirohashi was born in Niigata Prefecture, and her family's home was a Buddhist temple. Because of this, she attended Ryukoku University in Kyoto, a Buddhist university. In the middle of her first year, however, her parents told her that she could do what she liked, even if it wasn't related to Buddhism, so she sought out what she wanted to do. During her second year, she remembered a radio show she used to listen to in middle school and became interested in voice acting, so she started going to the Aoni Coaching School Osaka while attending university at the same time. The radio personality she had listened to in junior high school was a voice actor, which inspired her to become a voice actor herself.

Non-anime roles:
• Mast - Goddess of Victory: Nikke

__[Profile (Haikyo)](https://haikyo.co.jp/profile/profile.php?ActorID=11916) | [Twitter](http://twitter.com/rinasatoh)__

__Non-anime roles:__
- Guilty - Goddess of Victory: Nikke (VG)
- Eula - Genshin Impact (VG)
- USS California - Azur Lane (VG)
- Caesar King - Zenless Zone Zero (VG)
- Helena Martin - Reverse Collapse: Code Name Bakery (VG)

__Height:__ 170 cm (5' 7")

[Profile (Mausu)](https://mausu.net/talent/kojima-sachiko.html) | [Wiki (en)](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Sachiko_Kojima) | [Wiki (jp)](https://ja.wikipedia.org/wiki/%E5%B0%8F%E5%B3%B6%E5%B9%B8%E5%AD%90)

The founder and former representative director of [Funimation](https://anilist.co/studio/102/).

**Non-anime roles:**
- Policeman in "Chuck E. Cheese in the Galaxy 5000"

Singer/Song writer from Tokyo, Japan. She graduated from Tokyo National University of Fine Arts and Music. 
Passed away as a result of a terminal illness on August 4th, 2008

[Wiki (jp)](https://ja.wikipedia.org/wiki/佐々木史朗_(音楽プロデューサー%29) | [Flying Dog](https://www.jvcmusic.co.jp/flyingdog/)

The founder of record label [flying DOG](https://anilist.co/studio/464/flying-DOG).
Tyler Walker is an ADR Director, Script writer and voice actor for FUNimation.
_Note: Not to be confused with the [producer](https://anilist.co/staff/222835/)._
_Note: Not to be confused with the [animator](https://anilist.co/staff/254528/)._
